mapper.select: select * from (select ROWNUM RN, reviews.*from (select rownum ,review_num reviewNum, review_title reviewTitle, review_content reviewContent, review_date reviewDate,review_hit reviewHit, review_room_type reviewRoomType, user_id userId from reviews order by reviewNum DESC) reviews)reviews where RN between #{start} and #{end}

select review_num reviewNum, review_title reviewTitle, review_content reviewContent, review_date reviewDate,review_hit reviewHit, review_room_type reviewRoomType, user_id userId, row_number() over(order by review_num DESC)as rNum from kimkwangsoo.REVIEWS order by review_num DESC
mapper.update: update kimkwangsoo.REVIEWS set review_hit = review_hit + 1 where review_num = #{reviewNum}
mapper.select: select review_num reviewNum, review_title reviewTitle,review_content reviewContent,review_room_type reviewRoomType, review_rating reviewRating, user_id userId from kimkwangsoo.REVIEWS where review_num = #{reviewNum}
mapper.update: update kimkwangsoo.REVIEWS set review_title = #{reviewTitle}, review_room_type = #{reviewRoomType}, review_content = #{reviewContent}, review_rating = #{reviewRating ,jdbcType=INTEGER} where review_num = #{reviewNum}
